Webinar

Social Media: What Lawyers Need to Know

Tuesday January 11th | 10:00 AM EST

Looking to take a deep dive into your social worldâ€”and get all your questions answered? Then join Harvey Spectar and Mike Ross to tellus quis massa master the platform fast.

Register to watch

Learn how modern law firms are navigating the vast social seas as we explore how social media is entrenched throughout the legal industry, how we can use it as a legal tool as well as a marketing tool, and how we can take control of our online presence and strengthen our professional network.

Topics covered will include:

  • Why lawyers need to be competent in social media
  • Using social media for risk management of clients
  • Due diligence research on clients and jurors
  • Social media as evidence
  • Legal communications
